name: litUSD
description: litUSD is a U.S. dollar stablecoin developed with Brale and Stably for LitFinancial, a U.S-regulated mortgage lender. litUSD enables Lit to tokenize idle treasury cash for more efficient operations and on-chain liquidity. Lit Financial (NMLS #2553292) is a regulated mortgage lender from Michigan that offers next- generation financing solutions for American homebuyers. Founded in 2024, the company is led by FinTech and real estate veterans with over two decades of industry experience.
